reviews.comment:
I visited Cocoon Medical Spa Canggu today for their Purifying Facial and it was honestly one of the best skincare experiences I‚Äôve ever had. From the moment I walked in, the staff were welcoming, professional and made me feel completely at ease.

The facial itself was incredible deeply cleansing, nourishing, and so relaxing. My therapist explained every step, personalised the treatment to my skin, and was so gentle throughout. My skin feels unbelievably fresh, clean and glowing‚Ä¶ like a complete reset.

The clinic is stunning, super hygienic, and has such a calming atmosphere. I genuinely felt pampered from start to finish. Cocoon really lives up to their reputation  the quality and care is on another level.

I couldn‚Äôt recommend Cocoon Medical Spa more. If you‚Äôre in Bali and want a facial that truly transforms your skin, this is the place.

Thank you Amei, Ria + Santi

reviews.comment:
The atmosphere here is very comfortable and relaxing, making the treatment more enjoyable. The service is very friendly and professional, the staff are very helpful and patient. The results of the treatment are visible and satisfying, my skin is more glowing, clean, moisturized.
The products used are high quality and safe for my skin. The price offered is affordable for the quality you get. The beautician/therapist is very professional and experienced.
The place is clean and well-maintained, making me feel comfortable and safe.
They are very flexible with my schedule and needs.
Overall, I highly recommend this place for beauty treatments ü´∂üèªü•∞
